FuncDef:
The service-chain instance command creates a service chain instance and enters the service chain instance view.
The undo service-chain instance deletes a service chain instance.
By default, no service chain instance is created.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a service chain instance ID. This parameter must be specified when the service chain instance is created.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 64.

Specifies the name of a service chain instance.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported. When double quotation marks are used around the string, spaces are allowed in the string.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The service-chain instance command creates a service chain instance and enters the service chain instance view.
Precautions
Note the following when you run the service-chain instance command.
An instance ID that is already in use cannot be used on a new instance.The instance ID must be specified when you create a new service chain instance.An instance that is in use cannot be deleted.
